update doc_auth
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCESS = #{access,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EDIT_EN = #{editEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADD_EN = #{addEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETE_EN = #{deleteEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DOWNLOAD_EN = #{downloadEn,jdbcType=INTEGER},

DOC_PATH = #{docPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_NAME = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update doc_auth set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCESS = #{access,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EDIT_EN = #{editEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADD_EN = #{addEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_EN = #{deleteEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DOWNLOAD_EN = #{downloadEn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HERITABLE = #{heritable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DOC_PATH = #{docPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOC_NAME = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select doc_auth.ID as id, doc_auth.TYPE as type, doc_auth.PRIORITY as priority, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, DOC_ID, REPOS_ID, IS_ADMIN, ACCESS, EDIT_EN, ADD_EN, DELETE_EN, DOWNLOAD_EN, HERITABLE, DOC_PATH, DOC_NAME, user.NAME as userName,user.REAL_NAME as realName, user_group.NAME as groupName from doc_auth LEFT JOIN user on doc_auth.USER_ID = user.ID LEFT JOIN user_group on doc_auth.GROUP_ID = user_group.ID where REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select doc_auth.ID as id, doc_auth.TYPE as type, doc_auth.PRIORITY as priority, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, DOC_ID, REPOS_ID, IS_ADMIN, ACCESS, EDIT_EN, ADD_EN, DELETE_EN, DOWNLOAD_EN, HERITABLE, DOC_PATH, DOC_NAME, user.NAME as userName,user.REAL_NAME as realName from doc_auth LEFT JOIN user on doc_auth.USER_ID = user.ID where REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or USER_ID = 0 or GROUP_ID IN (select GROUP_ID from group_member where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}))

select doc_auth.ID as id, doc_auth.TYPE as type, doc_auth.PRIORITY as priority, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, DOC_ID, REPOS_ID, IS_ADMIN, ACCESS, EDIT_EN, ADD_EN, DELETE_EN, DOWNLOAD_EN, HERITABLE, DOC_PATH, DOC_NAME, user_group.NAME as groupName from doc_auth LEFT JOIN user_group on doc_auth.GROUP_ID = user_group.ID where REPOS_ID = #{reposId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or USER_ID = 0)
